projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with Django, featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: RESTful API Service
projects.description: A scalable REST API built with Flask and SQLAlchemy, featuring JWT authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive documentation with Swagger.

projects.title: Data Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard for data visualization and analysis using Pandas, Plotly, and Dash. Processes large datasets and provides insightful visualizations.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: A real-time chat application using Django Channels and WebSockets. Features multiple chat rooms, user presence, and message history.

projects.title: Automated Web Scraper
projects.description: A robust web scraping tool using Scrapy and BeautifulSoup that extracts, processes, and stores data from multiple sources with scheduling capabilities.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive task and project management system with team collaboration features, notifications, and progress tracking.
